creator: WOOD & Company Financial Services, a.s.
descriptionHtml:
EASY SETUP:
You can set up your Portu account easily from your phone. In a few minutes, we evaluate your risk profile and design a portfolio according to your needs and goals. You can also see the expected return of your investment. This way, you can easily grow your wealth for retirement or for any other long-term plans. As a more experienced investor, you can also set up and manage your investments by yourself. You always have your investments in your hands, yet they are constantly under the supervision of professionals.
PASSIVE INVESTING:
With Portu, you invest in low-cost, high-quality and liquid instruments - mostly in ETFs (exchange-traded funds) that copy market indices. Thanks to this, you invest in a globally diversified portfolio at the lowest possible costs.
SAFETY:
We do our best for security and protection of your investments and personal data. We have a license from the Czech National Bank, and we rely on the experience of WOOD & Company. A broker with 30 years of history. We insure deposits, provide a secured application and we only cooperate with strong and reliable partners.
KEY FUNCTIONALITIES:
- A modern and efficient way of investing for everyone from just CZK 1,000
- Investment tailored to your needs thanks to advanced automation and our own unique software
- Projection of the expected development of your investments
- Fully managed portfolios that are diversified, rebalanced, hedged, low-cost, and effectively allocated
- The ability to build your own investment strategy by selecting from a range of proven instruments
- Investments for children with the lowest fee in the market at 0.25% per annum
- One low transparent fee from 0.6% per annum for portfolios or 0.53% per annum for strategies
- Long-term investing at a discount of up to 40%
- Easy registration using your mobile phone or online
- Experienced portfolio managers at WOOD & Company, a Czech company with a 30-year history and the largest trader on the Prague Stock Exchange
descriptionShort: Portu offers a modern and efficient way of investing for everyone.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We continue to improve its features and bring updates to make the app even more useful and enjoyable to use.

title: Portu

creator: WOOD & Company Financial Services, a.s.
descriptionHtml:
INVESTMENT ALWAYS AT HAND:
Do you want to keep an overview of your investments at Portu at hand? With our Portu app, you can easily and securely log in to your account.

PASSIVE INVESTING:
With Portu, you invest in low-cost, high-quality, and liquid instruments - mostly ETFs, or exchange-traded funds, copying market indices. Thanks to this you invest in a globally diversified portfolio at the lowest possible costs.

SECURITY:
We go the extra mile to ensure the security and protection of your investments and personal data. We have a license from the Czech National Bank, and we rely on the experience of WOOD & Company. We insure all deposits, secure the application, and cooperate with reliable partners only.

KEY FUNCTIONALITIES:
- An overview of your investments in one place
- Biometric authentication
- Investing for everyone from as little as 20 EUR
- Access to all your accounts – personal, children’s or company
- Transaction history overview
descriptionShort: Portu offers a modern and efficient way of investing for everyone.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: The new version of the app comes with a redesign and multiple new functionalities. Finally, you will be able to see all your accounts – personal, children’s, company, and foreign currency ones. From now on, you can also use biometrics to log in.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This version introduces several new features for both existing and new users.
For existing users, we will now show notifications in the mobile app that you are used to in the web version. We also bring the ability to add an additional bank account or edit Portu questionnaires.
For new users, from this version onwards, we will allow you to register your Portu account directly in the app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: The new version of the application brings minor fixes and improvements.

title:
Portu
2.10.3

creator: WOOD & Company Financial Services, a.s.
descriptionHtml:
INVESTMENT ALWAYS AT HAND:
Do you want to keep an overview of your investments at Portu at hand? With our Portu app, you can easily and securely log in to your account.

PASSIVE INVESTING:
With Portu, you invest in low-cost, high-quality, and liquid instruments - mostly ETFs, or exchange-traded funds, copying market indices. Thanks to this you invest in a globally diversified portfolio at the lowest possible costs.

SECURITY:
We go the extra mile to ensure the security and protection of your investments and personal data. We have a license from the Czech National Bank, and we rely on the experience of WOOD & Company. We insure all deposits, secure the application, and cooperate with reliable partners only.

KEY FUNCTIONALITIES:
–⁠ Easy registration
–⁠ An overview of your investments in one place
–⁠ Biometric authentication
–⁠ Investing for everyone from as little as 20 EUR
–⁠ Access to all your accounts – personal, children’s or company
–⁠ Transaction history overview
descriptionShort: Portu offers a modern and efficient way of investing for everyone.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: The new version of the application brings minor fixes and improvements.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this version, we have improved the display of the charts to make them clearer and provide an even better overview of the development of your investment. We've also added the ability to perform a one-time portfolio rebalance even if you have automatic rebalancing turned on. In addition, we've worked on a few minor tweaks and bug fixes to make your investment experience as smooth as possible.

Thank you for investing with us!
